resources.string: Click on Settings to select the list of apps whose usage time has to be tracked by enabling them.
Click on Refresh to get the selected applications and its usage time
Find Daily usage in minutes, Weekly and Monthly usage in hours by clicking on each tab
Pinch to zoom in and zoom out the bar chart, to get a clear look
Scroll horizontally to view the usage time for all the apps selected
Select apps from Settings screen to view its usage info
Sorry. This feature is not available for you Android Version.
